name: Vision-Box
goal: Vision-Box® is committed to becoming the world’s leading company supporting governments, border control authorities, airports or all organizations that need to improve their security, by offering them superior, tailor-made, border control identity management and security solutions that excel in dependability, innovation and value creation, bring the best technological experience to people and organizations, and enhancing the collective values of security, safety, efficiency and convenience.
interests: Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
Digital economy & society;
Foreign and security policy;
Justice and Home Affairs;
Research and innovation;
Single market.
